LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Proglog: A member of the raiding team "{0}" answers the call. This raiding team is from {1}.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_SurrenderSuccess: After their demand was met, the raiding team {0} has turned away and is no longer heading toward the colony.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_GoalExp_Extortion: they tell us they launched this raid in order to force us to pay them a tribute of:\n {0}x Silver\n(can be paid with silver or gold or both combined, 1 gold = 10 silver)
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_GoalExp_Rescue: they tell us they launched this raid in order to rescue some of their fellows that were taken prisoner by our colony. The prisoners they demand us to release includes:\n{0}
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_GoalExp_Revenge: they tell us they launched this raid in order to avenge the death of {0} who was killed by our colony. They demand we execute the murderer {1}.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_GoalExp_Despoil: they tell us they launched this raid simply out of the need of for spoils. They demand we hand over the following things:
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_GoalExp_Enslave: they tell us this is a slaving raid, and they want to take away and enslave the following colonist:\n{0}
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_GoalExp_Conquer: they tell us they launched this raid in order to conquer this land for their faction, making this colony their new territory.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_DemandSurrender_rude: They demand our immediate surrender and threaten to raze the colony to the ground if their demands are not met.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_DemandSurrender_Polite: They convey their wish to avoid unnecessary casualties, and ask us to consider their demands.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Rebuff_Rescue: Execute the prisoners to make a statement.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Rebuff_Rescue_Fail: Not available. This negotiator is incapable of violence.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Rebuff_Confirmation: Are you sure you want to do this?
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Rebuff_Confirmation_Rescue: The following prisoners will be executed immediately:
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Rebuff_Explanation:
Doing this will boost the morale of all colonists based on {0}'s social skill. But beware, if the current negotiator's social skill is too poor, this might backfire. 

On the other hand, the enemy will become enraged. The raiding goal of this raiding party will change to SMITE, and you will no longer be able to communicate with them. Also, this raiding team will be reinforced (randomly from 25% to 100% of the current power).
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper: Try to negotiate over their demand.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Prolog: How do you want to negotiate?
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Intro: What should we say to them to stop them from approaching our colony?
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Staging: They've already stopped marching. Remaining Time: {0}
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_CoolDown: We can only try to ask them this once every hour. Remaining Time: {0}
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_DoneBefore: We can only ask them to do this once.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Smite_Name: to make them angry and punish us
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Persuasion: "Give us some time to think about it. This is good for both you and us."
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Intimidation_Rescue: "We need time to discuss your suggestion. Do not approach our colony any further, or we will execute the prisoners you want right now!"
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Intimidation_Despoil: "We need time to discuss your suggestion. Do not approach our colony any further, or you will get nothing but our mortar fire!"
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Intimidation_Revenge: "We need time to discuss your suggestion. Do not approach our colony any further, or you will get nothing but our mortar fire!"
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Intimidation_Enslave: "We need time to discuss your suggestion. Do not approach our colony any further, or you will get nothing but our mortar fire!"
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Intimidation_Extortion: "We need time to discuss your suggestion. Do not approach our colony any further, or you will get nothing but our mortar fire!"
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Beguilement_Rescue: "The prisoners you want are in one of our trading caravans. Stop your marching and give us some time to send them back here."
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Beguilement_Despoil: "We don't have sufficient resources here in our colony. We are transporting some resources from our trading caravan. Give us some time and stop your marching."
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Beguilement_Revenge: "The person you want is not here in this colony but one of our trading caravans. We are recalling that person, so stop your matching and give us some time."
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Beguilement_Enslave: "The person you want is not here in this colony but one of our trading caravans. We are recalling that person, so stop your matching and give us some time."
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Beguilement_Extortion: "We don't have enough silver here in our colony. We are recalling our trading caravan to bring back some silver. Give us some time and stop your marching."
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Success: {0} agree to stop for a while. However, they say that they will only stop for three hours. After three hours, if their demand is still not met, they will keep heading towards the colony.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Fail: They spurn our suggestion and keep on marching towards the colony.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Delay_Smite: They are insulted by our intimidation attempt, and will not communicate with us any further.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegCoolDown: We can only negotiate once per hour. Remaining Time: {0}
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Surrender_Comfirma: Are you sure you want to give in to their demand?
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Surrender_Fail_Con: Not available. If we accept, this game will no longer be playable.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Surrender_Fail_NoM: Not available. We don't have enough silver or gold.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Surrender_Fail_Pri: Not available. At least one of the prisoners is not available.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Surrender_Fail_Ens: Not available. At least one of the colonists they want are not available.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Bargain_Intro: To what extent do you want to reduce their demand?
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Bargin_Begin: What should we say to them?
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Bargain_Invalid_Co: Not available. They want full control of the colony.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Bargain_Invalid_On: Not available. They only want one prisoner. Cannot reduce this demand further.
Not available. They only want one colonist. Cannot reduce this demand further
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Bargain_Success: They have agreed to reduce their demand.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Bargain_Fail: They have refused our suggestion about reducing their demand, and the demand will remain the same.
LanguageData.PES_raidNeg_NegDeeper_Bargain_Smite: They are insulted by our negotiation attempt, and will not communicate with us any further.
LanguageData.PES_raidNeg_NegDeeper_Bargain_Success_Na: to make them accept our suggestion
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Negdeeper_Bargain_Smite_Name: to make them angry and punish us
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_NegDeeper_Remedy: It's not possible to meet their demand. Try to give them something else as a remedy.\n
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Sub_Rescue_NoPrisoner: No prisoner from their faction is in our custody
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Sub_success: They accepted our suggestion! Their raiding goal has changed.
LanguageData.PES_RaidNeg_Sub_Fail: They refused our suggestion! Their raiding goal remains the same...
